function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Close contact settings increase the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly ventilated indoor areas increase the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Activities with increased particle emission raise the risk of covid-19 iaq","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation rates for controlling infection probability","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on mechanical ventilation systems for indoor air quality control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments due to inadequate ventilation and overcrowding","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or emphasis on the effectiveness of engineering controls for reducing airborne infection risks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air stagnation in confined spaces with
